description:
Takafumi`s uncle wakes up from a 17-year coma, claiming he was in another dimension, and he tries to prove it by showing off his magical powers.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: I`m Finally Back from the Fantasy World of Granbahamal After 17 Long Years!
Isekai Granbahamal ni Juunananen Itaga Youyaku Kaette Kita, Zo
Po 17 długich latach wreszcie wróciłem z magicznego świata Granbahamal
異世界グランバハマルに17年いたがようやく帰ってきた, ぞ
